## MetaManager cd

Change current working directory (uses current context)

### Synopsis

When current context is gdrive, changes the current Drive directory. Use ".." or a path relative to current directory.

```
MetaManager cd [path] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for cd
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -d, --debug   enable debug logging
```
